name: Project Netra
body:
### Namaste!
This project was initially developed during the course of 2 undergraduate research internships at an NGO [NEFORD (Nand Educational Foundation for Rural Development)](http://nefordlucknow.org.in/) under advisory of it's Executive Director Dr. R.K.Singh and with the voluntary supervision of Dr. Chhedi Lal Verma at [Central Soil Salinity Research Institute (Regional Research Station Lucknow)](http://www.cssri.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=119&Itemid=92), India. It was developed with the aim of analyzing the field state and identifying unique patterns pertaining to the logged data. With the focus on developing cheap, automated, scalable systems using Digital Signal Processing, Machine Learning and Embedded Systems, leveraging the domain knowledge.

### Authors and Contributors
The lead author & researcher for the project over the course of both internships and present is @Joshi-Harsh . He is currently actively involved with the project development. 'Netra' Module is co-authored by @cssanjay during the course of 1st Internship during May 2015 - August 2015. He also contributed towards its testing and documentation over the course of 2nd Internship during December 2015 - August 2016. For the implementation of hardware schmatics & testing of the embedded systems, [Farogh Iftekhar](mailto: farogh007@gmail.com) contributed during the course of 2nd Internship.

### Support or Contact
The repository is under the process of documentation and other refinements for uploading. Please bear with us for some time, we know how much you want to view the juicy stuff ;)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
